meanings.definition: The cost of traveling by airplane.
meanings.sent1: The airfare for the trip was very expensive.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't afford the airfare for my vacation.
meanings.sent3: The airfare was so high, it felt like the plane was made of gold.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight with the airfare in hand.
meanings.sent5: The airfare soared higher than the clouds, unreachable for many.

meanings.definition: The price of a ticket for a flight.
meanings.sent1: The airfare to Paris was surprisingly affordable.
meanings.sent2: She purchased the airfare online for a discount.
meanings.sent3: The airfare was so cheap, it felt like winning a prize.
meanings.sent4: His hopes took off along with the airfare he booked.
meanings.sent5: The airfare was a golden ticket to new adventures.
